body.p: In July 1999, the Board approved E64 Investment Property, with a comment deadline of 31 October 1999. The Board received 121 comment letters on E64. Comment letters came from various international organisations, as well as from 28 individual countries. The Board approved IAS 40 Investment Property in March 2000. Paragraph B67 below summarises the changes that the Board made to E64 in finalising IAS 40.
